Content.Text:
<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, hello. What's your name? ...Hmm, are you
the same <MYNAME> who just moved into town
as a farmer?
<PAGE>
I'm Dessie. Nice to meet you.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. Are you going to
work? I'm going for a walk.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. Today is Train to
Transform into a Rabbit Day. Well, if you're me,
that is.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Pardon me, would you? I'm in the middle of my
training.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
<MYNAME>, can you see me right now?
<PAGE>
...Aww, that means my magic didn't work.
*sob*

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Good evening, <MYNAME>. Today's training is
almost finished.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good evening, <MYNAME>. I need to get back
to my house in the pond.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Today is a lovely day, isn't it?

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I like rainy days sometimes. They make the
forest happy, like it is right now.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's really hot today, isn't it? Of course, I have to
pretend it doesn't bother me. I'm Dessie, after all.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
It's going to be so much cooler after this rain's
all done.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
It's a beautiful day, isn't it? Mmm, so
refreshing...

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm, what to do about all this rain... I know! I'll
try to stop it as part of my training! ♪

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Mmm, the weather's so beautiful today! Of
course, even if it were cold, I'd still be dressed
like this. I'm Dessie, after all.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Achoo... Aww, I don't like snow. It's so cold.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I wonder if Witchie's the one who brought the
storm...

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You're so energetic. You came through all this
snow just to say hi.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<MYNAME>, you look happy these days.
<PAGE>
And I know whyyy! How do I know? Well, I'm
Dessie, after all.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Witchie's nice to me. She lets me be her servant,
and I learn a little magic just from watching her
around the house. ♪

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
This is my very favorite place to practice my
magic.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
The Nature Sprites make my life easy and fun.
They get really loud sometimes, though...

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Phew... Walking kinda wears you out, doesn't it?

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Basically, goddesses don't usually walk around.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You're working on a farm, right?
<PAGE>
And you live way up there? Great! Hope to see
you soon. ♪

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I can turn into any animal, because I'm Dessie!
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>...Sometimes I don't do it right, though, and I
turn into something gross and yucky. It always
makes me sad...

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Goddess training is really hard, because you
have to be good at EVERYTHING.
<PAGE>
Sometimes when I'm tired, I don't train too well,
and then I get kind of depressed.
<PAGE>
But if I go talk to Witchie, she cheers me right
up! ♪ Witchie's awesome.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Do you know Gaia? She's my big sister.
<PAGE>
She's a great goddess. She can grant annny
wish.
<PAGE>
I want to learn how to grant wishes just like she
does.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So if you're talking to me, that means you
believe in me, right? Me and the others like me?
<PAGE>
Sometimes I worry that people really don't
believe in us anymore.
<PAGE>
...It makes me really sad to think about that.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I was just a little fledgling goddess when the
other fledglings left me behind.
<PAGE>
So I came down here alone to train by myself.
<PAGE>
But that's how I got to be Witchie's servant, so it
all worked out! ♪

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, listen, <MYNAME>. You've made me a lot
of offerings.
<PAGE>
I really appreciate your kindness...but I'm sorry I
can't grant your wish. I'm ashamed of myself.
<PAGE>
One day, when I've learned to be a great
goddess, I'll grant all your wishes. So please be
patient with me.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Thank you very much. This is my favorite, but
please offer it at the pond if it's okay with you.
<PAGE>
I believe something good will happen to you if
you do that.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Thank you very much. I really like this, but
please offer it at the pond if it's okay with you.
<PAGE>
I believe something good will happen to you if
you do that.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Thank you very much. I like this, but please offer
it at the pond if it's okay with you.
<PAGE>
I believe something good will happen to you if
you do that.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Thank you very much. But please offer it at the
pond if it's okay with you.
<PAGE>
I believe something good will happen to you if
you do that.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thank you very much for the thought, but, um, I
don't really like those, so please don't offer it at
the pond like you usually would.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>...Because that would make me sad.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thank you very much for the thought, but, um, I
really don't like those, so please don't offer it at
the pond like you usually would.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>...Because that would make me cry.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thank you very much for the thought, but, um, I
kind of hate those, so please don't offer it at the
pond like you usually would.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>...Because that would make me cry.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thank you very much. I really like this, but
please offer it at the pond if it's okay with you.
<PAGE>
I believe something good will happen to you if
you do that.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thank you very much. I like this, but please offer
it at the pond if it's okay with you.
<PAGE>
I believe something good will happen to you if
you do that.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thank you very much. But please offer it at the
pond if it's okay with you.
<PAGE>
I believe something good will happen to you if
you do that.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, if you want to make an offering, please
throw an item into the pond.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, if you want to make an offering, please
throw an item into the pond.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Thank you very much. This is my favorite, but
please offer it at the pond if it's okay with you.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Oh, it's a birthday present for me? Then I'll take
it.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Thank you very much. I really like this, but
please offer it at the pond if it's okay with you.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Oh, it's a birthday present for me? Then I'll take
it.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Thank you very much. I like this, but please offer
it at the pond if it's okay with you.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Oh, it's a birthday present for me? Then I'll take
it.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Thank you very much. But please offer it at the
pond if it's okay with you.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Oh, it's a birthday present for me? Then I'll take
it.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thank you very much. But I don't really like
those...
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>Oh, it's a birthday present for me? Well, I guess I
have no choice, then. Do I...? No, I'll take it.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
What? No, I hate that! I don't want it at all...
<PAGE>
Oh, it's a birthday present for me? Th-then I
guess I'll take it... I don't need it, though.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
What? I really hate that! I don't want it...
<PAGE>
Oh, it's a birthday present for me? Th-then I
guess I'll take it... I don't need it, though.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thank you very much. I really like this, but
please offer it at the pond if it's okay with you.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Oh, it's a birthday present for me? Then I'll take
it.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thank you very much. I like this, but please offer
it at the pond if it's okay with you.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Oh, it's a birthday present for me? Then I'll take
it.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thank you very much. But please offer it at the
pond if it's okay with you.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Oh, it's a birthday present for me? Then I'll take
it.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Whoooaaa! That's a really cute rabbit!
<PAGE>
I wonder if I could turn into one just like it.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thank you very much. But please offer it at the
pond if it's okay with you.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Oh, it's a present for the Flower Fair? Then here,
I'll take it.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A blue feather... That's what you give when you
wanna ask your true love to marry you, right?
<PAGE>
Aww, I pray that you'll always be happy!

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A ring?! That's a symbol of true love. You should
give it to someone precious.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Aww, what a cute ribbon. What's inside?

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, there's something wrapped up in here, huh?
Wonder what it is.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Happy birthday, <MYNAME>! Here's your present
from me!

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's your birthday, isn't it, <MYNAME>? Happy
birthday.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, <MYNAME>... We haven't talked in a long
time. Have you been busy?

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
That outfit really looks good on you. The red
skirt is cute. ♪

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Pink clothes are cute and pretty, right? ♪

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
That outfit is sooo cute. It looks very good on
you. ♪

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, you look different in those clothes. You
look so cute. ♪

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, what a gorgeous dress. I like bright
colors. ♪

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, what a gorgeous outfit. I like bright
colors. ♪

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, what a gorgeous dress. I like bright
colors. ♪

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
That's a really beautiful skirt. It's very cute. ♪

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, that sweater looks warm! And I like the
color, too. It's beautiful.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, you look good in that lime-color
vest. Ah, I wish I could dress up.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I like the color of that hoodie. It's like a
strawberry! ♪

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, that sweater looks warm! The color
reminds me of the sun.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wow, <MYNAME>. You came here to give me a
prayer? I like your attitude.
<PAGE>
...Hm? That's not why you came here? Really?
Oh...

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, that's what ninjas wear, right?! Well, of
course I know about ninjas. I'm a goddess. ♪
<PAGE>
A long time ago, in Sakura Country, there were
people who lived in the shadows. I learned that
from Torque.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, that's a cheongsam! Impressive! It's so
attractive!
<PAGE>
I really want to grow up as fast as I can. I'm
gonna be attractive, too.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<MYNAME>, that outfit you're wearing is really
wild.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, you look really different than usual.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>Huh? Those are work clothes?
<PAGE>
Humans' clothes are confusing sometimes...

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
W-w-whaaa? You can use magic too?! That's
amazing! You're a human who can transform
into...
<PAGE>
...Oh, that's a costume? Oh, I see. Well, that
makes sense. I thought it was magic.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
W-w-whaaa? You can use magic too?! That's
amazing! You're a human who can transform
into...
<PAGE>
...Oh, that's a costume? Oh, I see. Well, that
makes sense. I thought it was magic.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
W-w-whaaa? You can use magic too?! That's
amazing! You're a human who can transform
into...
<PAGE>
...Oh, that's a costume? Oh, I see. Well, that
makes sense. I thought it was magic.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
W-w-whaaa? You can use magic too?! That's
amazing! You're a human who can transform
into...
<PAGE>
...Oh, that's a costume? Oh, I see. Well, that
makes sense. I thought it was magic.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
W-w-whaaa? You can use magic too?! That's
amazing! You're a human who can transform
into...
<PAGE>
...Oh, that's a costume? Oh, I see. Well, that
makes sense. I thought it was magic.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That hat looks really good on you. It's red and
cute. ♪

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That hat looks really good on you. I like the
bright green color. ♪

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, you're putting a flower in your hair, too! We
can be hair twins! ♪

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, that's a cute hat. You look like a magician.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, that hat is cute! It looks like a cow's hide!
Kinda wild, but kinda cute too. ♪

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What's wrong, <MYNAME>? Did you do a
transformation wrong or something? You still
have cat ears on your head.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, that is a very cute hat. ♪ Humans get to
wear all kinds of hats. I'm kind of jealous about
that.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, if you want to make an offering, please
throw an item into the pond.
